sqlMap.select: select a.mem_id, a.mus_no, a.mus_like_date, b.mus_title, d.sing_name, d.sing_image, c.alb_name from MUSIC_LIKE a, music b, album c , singer d where a.mus_no = b.mus_no and b.alb_no = c.alb_no and c.sing_no = d.sing_no and a.mem_id=#mem_id#
